item.title: [Pi]371,item command meanwhile in combat hELP!
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

k,i thought i figured it out … but jea its me
the code itself works,but it lets me pickup either i am in cmbt or not

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights >= 0) { if (c.underAttackBy <= 0 ) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for(int element : noSpawn) { if(element == newItemID) { c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item."); return; } } if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp"); } } else { c.sendMessage("You can't do that while in combat!"); } }
so,any ideas?
